title: Junia: The magic of the element souls
features: Junia - The Magic Of The Element SoulsWelcome to the magical world of Junia, a place where everything is made up of souls from the green grass you walk on to the lake made of lava, everything in Junia is alive.Some people just don't know it yet.Mira the princess of Cosima wakes one night to an attack on her home, the culprit, a Grand Dark Witch who plans on taking over the throne and the whole of Junia and doesn't care for who she kills in the process. To save her Kingdom Mira must venture out into a world she doesn't really know or understand, to collect all the Element Souls, to then awaken the final Element Soul who will be powerful enough to defeat the Grand Dark Witch but not all the people she meets wish to help her on her journey. For the royal family is disregarded as traitors to the religion of Junia and to the Element Souls themselves. And with a chance to find love will she lose it all to keep it or will Mira abide by her royal duties and save her Kingdom first? Or will she lose everything by the hand of an ancient evil?
description: Mercedes Prunty is a wife, mother, author, blogger and lover of all things Fantasy and Zombie. Born and raised in East Sussex, UK she original started off hairdressing before falling pregnant with her eldest, it was then and with her second pregnancy that she fell in love with writing. So far she has written four books, Alone, Lone, The Keeper of the Key and Junia and she plans on writing many more in the future.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/B1jhBt4K9ZS._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Mercedes Prunty', 'about': ["Mercedes Prunty is a mother, wife, author, blogger, public speaker and travel writer from East Sussex in the UK. She loves nothing more than taking the kids for a day out then settling down at home with a cuppa and a good book. She currently writes in the genres of Fantasy, Zombie Horror, Children's Books and self help (how to write and self-publish).", "She began her writing career in 2015 when she released her first book 'The Keeper of the Key', which she has since re-released with a new cover design. Since 2015 she has so far self-Published 8 books, The keeper of the key, The Amoeba from the Ash, Alone, Lone, One, Junia, BunnyMoo and All under one umbrella - How to write and self-publish your own book by a self-Published author. She also plans on writing many, many more.", "She is a travel writer for the online travel magazine 'B-C-ing-U' and writes all about her travels and days out with her family. She is also a blogger who writes hints, tips and all about her writing journey in the hope that it will help other authors and writers. Why not check out her blog on www.mercedespruntyauthor.wordpress.com, or on Facebook on her author page at Mercedes Prunty Author or on Twitter @MercedesPrunty"]}
